description: 教導學生職場英文相關知識及培養學生在職場上應用英文的能力。

syllabus.zh:
1. 資訊與網路世界
2. 職場詞彙
4. 製作英文PPT
5. 自傳/履歷表撰寫
6. 英文簡報技能
syllabus.en:
1. Information & Using the Internet
2. Terminology in Workplace
2. PPT in English
3. Biography/Resume Writing
4. Presentation Skills

weeklySchedule:
Week 1: The Course Introduction/How to use AI tools to improve English capability
Week 2: Unit 1 COVID-19 Pandemic/Unit 2 Tesla
Week 3: Unit 3 Tablets/Unit 4 Touchscreens
Week 4: Unit 5 Unmanned Aerial Vehicle/Unit 6 Accelerometer & Gyroscope
Week 5: Unit 7 Knowledge Management/Unit 8 What are Trademarks?
Week 6: Unit 9 What is Copyright?/Unit 10 Patents in the USA
Week 7: Unit 11 Filling a Design Patent/Unit 12 Non-Provisional Utility Patent Application
Week 8: Unit 13 Flexible Manufacturing in the USA
Week 9: Mid-term Exam
Week 10: Unit 14 Taguchi's Ideas about Quality
Week 11: Unit 15 CAD / CAM / CAE ~Unit 16 Simulation of a Manufacturing / Warehousing System
Week 12: Unit 17 Development of E-commerce in Manufacturing Operations/Unit 18 Digitization in Telecommunications
Week 13: Unit 19 Origin of Integrated Circuit/Unit 20 Fabrication of Integrated Circuit
Week 14: Unit 21 Killers of Semiconductors
Week 15: Unit 22 TFT-LCD Displays/Unit 23 LED and OLED Displays
Week 16: Unit 24 Virtual Reality
Week 17: Unit 25 Applications of Nanotechnology in Bio-Engineering /Unit 26 Research in Stem Cells
Week 18: Final Report

exams.other: 平時出席表現/課堂作業

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能分析資管相關專業英語資料
能正確應用英語與外籍專業從業人員溝通
能體認英語重要性並能適應社會全球化趨勢

textbook.title: 科技英文導讀 Selective Readings in Technology and Management
textbook.author: 李開偉
textbook.publisher: 全華圖書股份有限公司

rules: 本課程會利用AI工具進行口語、閱讀與書寫的操演，可帶筆電上課。課程將搭配資管期刊與相關雜誌進行補充與討論。
